items.title: Tender auditing for pharma
items.challenge: Compare complex proposals across suppliers with accuracy and traceability.
items.solution: Application with customizable comparison rules and reporting for pharmaceutical tenders, built on microservices with distributed cache, Kubernetes, MongoDB, Kafka and end-to-end observability.
items.result: Faster reviews, clear audit trails, and scalable throughput during peak tender cycles.
